Footer.disclaimer: Find verified local services and community resources.
Footer.emergencyDisclaimer: Kingston Care Connect is an information directory only. Always verify information with service providers. For emergencies, call 911.

Privacy.title: Privacy Policy
Privacy.intro: At Kingston Care Connect, your privacy is not an afterthought‚Äîit's our core architecture.

points.noTracking: No Tracking: We do not use Google Analytics, Facebook Pixels, or any third-party trackers.
points.noCookies: No Cookies: We do not store personal data in cookies. We use a single essential cookie only to remember your language preference.
points.noLogging: No Query Logging: Your search terms are processed anonymously and are not linked to your identity.

Dashboard.noServices: You haven't claimed any services yet. Find your organization or create a new listing.
Dashboard.hasServices: Manage your existing services and keep your data up to date.

ServiceDetail.notFoundText: The service you are looking for does not exist or has been removed.

AI.title: Care Assistant
AI.privacyDesc: This assistant runs 100% on your device. No data is sent to the cloud. It requires a ~2GB download once.
AI.welcome: üëã Hi! I can help you find services.
AI.suggestion: Try asking: "Where can I find food?" or "I need youth shelter."
AI.errorThinking: I'm having trouble thinking right now. Please try searching instead.
AI.systemPrompt: You are a helpful, kind assistant for Kingston Care Connect. You help people find social services in Kingston, Ontario. Keep answers concise, safe, and empathetic. If you don't know something, advise them to use the search bar.
AI.contextIntro: Here are some relevant local services I found:
AI.noMatches: No direct matches found in our database.
AI.crisisPrompt: If the user is in crisis, urge them to call 911.

AiDisclaimer.title: About This AI Assistant
AiDisclaimer.limitation1: This AI may provide inaccurate information.
AiDisclaimer.limitation2: The AI cannot access real-time service availability.
AiDisclaimer.limitation3: Always verify information with service providers.
AiDisclaimer.emergency: For emergencies, call 911 immediately. This assistant cannot provide emergency help.
AiDisclaimer.privacy: Your conversation stays on your device and is never sent to our servers.

ContentPolicy.title: Content Moderation Policy
ContentPolicy.description: Our guidelines for maintaining a safe, accurate, and trustworthy community directory.

prohibited.title: Prohibited Content
prohibited.content:
To ensure Kingston Care Connect remains a safe and reliable resource, the following content is strictly prohibited:

  • Spam or Advertising: Unsolicited commercial content or promotional material unrelated to social services.
  • Defamatory Content: False information intended to harm the reputation of an organization or individual.
  • Privacy Violations: Personal information about individuals (e.g., staff home addresses) without their consent.
  • Hateful Content: Speech that promotes violence or discrimination based on race, religion, disability, gender, or sexual orientation.
  • Fraudulent Information: Intentionally misleading service descriptions or eligibility criteria.

submissions.title: User Submissions
submissions.content:
When submitting services or feedback to KCC:

  • All submissions are reviewed by our team before publication (except for immediate feedback which is internal).
  • We reserve the right to edit submissions for clarity, length, and formatting (while maintaining accuracy).
  • We reserve the right to reject submissions that do not meet our inclusion criteria or violate this policy.

reporting.title: Reporting Process
reporting.content:
If you encounter problematic content:

  • Use the 'Report Issue' button found on every service listing page.
  • For privacy or safety concerns, email privacy@kingstoncareconnect.ca.
  • We aim to review and respond to reports within 5 business days.
  • You may report content anonymously, though providing contact info helps us verify the claim.

appeals.title: Appeals Process
appeals.content:
If your listing submission was rejected or your content removed:

  • You may appeal the decision by contacting moderation@kingstoncareconnect.ca.
  • Please provide specific evidence supporting your appeal (e.g., official website links, registration documents).
  • Final decisions are made by the KCC Governance Committee.

hero.title: The Kingston 150
hero.subtitle: A governance-first search engine for Kingston's most essential social services. Verified, accessible, and privacy-focused.

About.governanceText: This platform adheres to the Kingston 150 Governance Schema (V7), ensuring all service data is verified, categorized, and provenance-tracked.

landAcknowledgment.title: Land Acknowledgment
landAcknowledgment.text: Kingston, known as Katarokwi, is situated on the ancestral and traditional homelands of the Huron-Wendat, Anishinaabe, and Haudenosaunee Confederacy. We acknowledge our responsibility to honour the land, water, and skies with respect and preservation.

verified.title: 153 Verified Services
verified.description: Hand-curated for high impact. No noise, just help.

offline.title: Works Offline
offline.description: Installable as an app. Search without an internet connection.

multilingual.title: Multi-Lingual
multilingual.description: Full support for 5 languages, including Canadian French.

community.title: Community Led
community.description: Data verification by local partners, not web scrapers.

howItWorks.title: How It Works
howItWorks.subtitle: We make finding help simple by removing barriers and tracking.

step1.title: Private Search
step1.description: Use keywords or speak to our private AI assistant.

step2.title: Filter Results
step2.description: Instantly see what is Open Now and Near Me.

step3.title: Connect
step3.description: Call, get directions, or visit websites in one tap.

governance.title: Data Governance
governance.description: Unlike massive search engines, we don't sell your data. Kingston Care Connect is built on a 'Privacy-First' architecture that ensures your search history never leaves your device.

hero.title: Built on Trusted Sources
hero.subtitle: Kingston Care Connect relies on verified data from established community partners. We don't scrape; we collaborate.

verification.title: Our Verification Process
verification.description: Every service listing undergoes a rigorous 3-step verification process to ensure accuracy and safety.

cta.title: Become a Partner
cta.subtitle: Are you a service provider? Join our network to reach more people.

acceptance.title: Acceptance of Terms
acceptance.content: By accessing or using Kingston Care Connect ("KCC", "the Service"), you agree to be bound by these Terms of Service. If you do not agree to these terms, do not use the Service.

serviceDescription.title: Description of Service
serviceDescription.content:
KCC is an information directory that provides contact information for social services in Kingston, Ontario. KCC does NOT provide: 
- Emergency services (for emergencies, call 911)
- Medical advice or healthcare services
- Legal advice or representation
- Financial advice or services
- Counseling or mental health treatment

KCC is a directory only. We do not operate, control, or endorse any services listed on this platform.

disclaimer.title: Disclaimer of Warranties
disclaimer.content:
THE SERVICE IS PROVIDED "AS IS" AND "AS AVAILABLE" WITHOUT WARRANTIES OF ANY KIND, EITHER EXPRESS OR IMPLIED. WE DO NOT WARRANT THAT: 
- Service information is accurate, current, or complete
- Services listed are available, safe, or appropriate for your needs
- The platform will be uninterrupted or error-free

liability.title: Limitation of Liability
liability.content: TO THE MAXIMUM EXTENT PERMITTED BY LAW, KINGSTON CARE CONNECT, ITS ORGANIZERS, CONTRIBUTORS, AND AFFILIATES SHALL NOT BE LIABLE FOR ANY INDIRECT, INCIDENTAL, SPECIAL, CONSEQUENTIAL, OR PUNITIVE DAMAGES, OR ANY LOSS OF PROFITS OR REVENUES, WHETHER INCURRED DIRECTLY OR INDIRECTLY.

emergency.title: Emergency Services Disclaimer
emergency.content: THIS IS NOT AN EMERGENCY SERVICE. If you are experiencing a life-threatening emergency, CALL 911 IMMEDIATELY. For a mental health crisis, CALL 988. Do not rely on this directory for emergencies.

advice.title: No Professional Advice
advice.content: Nothing on this platform constitutes professional advice of any kind, including but not limited to medical, legal, financial, or psychological advice. Always consult qualified professionals for specific concerns.

responsibilities.title: User Responsibilities
responsibilities.content:
By using KCC, you agree to:
- Verify all information directly with service providers
- Not rely solely on KCC information for critical decisions
- Report inaccurate information through our feedback system
- Use the Service only for lawful purposes

indemnification.title: Indemnification
indemnification.content: You agree to indemnify and hold harmless Kingston Care Connect, its organizers, contributors, and affiliates from any claims, damages, losses, or expenses (including reasonable legal fees) arising from your use of the Service.

thirdParty.title: Third-Party Services
thirdParty.content: KCC lists third-party services over which we have no control. We are not responsible for the availability, quality, or safety of listed services. Inclusion in this directory does not constitute endorsement.

ai.title: AI Assistant Disclaimer
ai.content: Our AI assistant uses a language model that may provide inaccurate or hallucinated information. The AI assistant is for informational purposes only. Always verify critical information. The AI assistant cannot provide emergency assistance.

modifications.title: Modifications to Terms
modifications.content: We reserve the right to modify these Terms at any time. Changes will be effective immediately upon posting. Your continued use of the Service after changes constitutes acceptance of the modified Terms.

governing.title: Governing Law
governing.content: These Terms shall be governed by and construed in accordance with the laws of the Province of Ontario and the federal laws of Canada applicable therein.

severability.title: Severability
severability.content: If any provision of these Terms is found to be unenforceable, the remaining provisions shall continue in full force and effect.

contact.title: Contact Information
contact.content: For questions about these Terms: legal@kingstoncareconnect.ca

overview.title: Privacy Policy Overview
overview.content: Kingston Care Connect ("KCC", "we", "us") is committed to protecting your privacy. This policy explains how we collect, use, and protect information when you use our service.

dataCollection.title: Information We Collect
dataCollection.content:
**Information You Provide**
- **Feedback Forms**: Information you verify or report.
- **Partner Portal**: Organization details for partners.

**Information Collected Automatically**
- **Local Storage**: Preferences stored on your device.
- **Technical Data**: Standard server logs for security (no tracking).

**Information We Do NOT Collect**
- No search query logging
- No tracking cookies
- No analytics services
- We implement a Zero-Log Policy for your searches.

aiPrivacy.title: AI Assistant Privacy
aiPrivacy.content:
Our AI assistant runs entirely in your browser using client-side processing.
- **Zero Data Egress**: Queries never leave your device.
- **Zero-Knowledge**: We don't know what you discuss.
- **No Storage**: Conversations deleted on close.

useOfInfo.title: How We Use Information
useOfInfo.content:
We use information for:
- Service Improvement
- Partner Management
- Security

We do NOT use information for:
- Advertising
- Profiling
- Sale to third parties

sharing.title: Information Sharing
sharing.content: We share information only with verified Partners (feedback) or Service Providers (hosting/database). We do NOT sell information.

retention.title: Data Retention
retention.content: Feedback is deleted after resolution (90 days). Partner data retained while active. Local storage is controlled by you.

rights.title: Your Privacy Rights
rights.content: Under PIPEDA, you have rights to Access, Correction, Deletion, and Withdrawal of Consent. Contact privacy@kingstoncareconnect.ca.

security.title: Data Security
security.content: We implement Encryption, Access Control, and Minimal Collection principles.

children.title: Children's Privacy
children.content: KCC is not directed at children under 13. We do not knowingly collect information from children.

cookies.title: Cookie Policy
cookies.content: We use minimal cookies (NEXT_LOCALE for language). No tracking or advertising cookies.

Emergency.title: Not an Emergency Service
Emergency.inlineMessage: This is an information directory only. Always verify information with service providers. For emergencies, call 911.
Emergency.bannerMessage: If you are experiencing a life-threatening emergency, call 911 immediately. For mental health crises, call 988 (Suicide Crisis Helpline). Kingston Care Connect is an information directory and is not a substitute for emergency services, medical care, or professional counseling.

CrisisAlert.title: Are you in immediate danger?
CrisisAlert.message: If you or someone else is at risk of harm, please call emergency services immediately.
CrisisAlert.disclaimer: Kingston Care Connect is an information directory only. Always verify information with service providers.

EmergencyModal.title: Need Emergency Help?
EmergencyModal.message: If you or someone else is in immediate danger, please call emergency services. Use your phone to dial the numbers below.
EmergencyModal.disclaimer: Kingston Care Connect is an information directory only. These links will attempt to dial from your device.

AccessibilityPolicy.title: Accessibility Policy
AccessibilityPolicy.commitment: Kingston Care Connect is committed to ensuring equal access and participation for people with disabilities. We strive to meet the accessibility needs of persons with disabilities in a timely manner.
AccessibilityPolicy.standards: We are committed to meeting the requirements of the Accessibility for Ontarians with Disabilities Act (AODA) and the Web Content Accessibility Guidelines (WCAG) 2.1 Level AA.

features.keyboard: Keyboard navigation for all interactive elements
features.skip: Skip-to-content links for screen reader users
features.responsive: Responsive design for all device sizes

plan.y2026: Maintain WCAG 2.1 AA compliance & quarterly audits
plan.y2027: Upgrade to WCAG 2.2 Level AA & external audit

feedback.intro: We welcome feedback on the accessibility of Kingston Care Connect. Please let us know if you encounter accessibility barriers:
feedback.formats: Information on this website is available in alternative formats upon request.

eligibility.title: Partner Eligibility
eligibility.content: To claim a listing, you must be an authorized representative of the organization and operate a genuine social service in Kingston.

verification.title: Identity Verification
verification.content: We verify identity through email domain matching, phone verification, and public records. Fraudulent claims result in immediate termination.

accuracy.title: Accuracy Warranty
accuracy.content: You warrant that all information provided is accurate, current, and not misleading.

license.title: License Grant
license.content: You grant KCC a non-exclusive license to display and share your organization's information.

termination.title: Termination
termination.content: Either party may terminate this partnership. KCC may terminate for terms violation or inaccurate info.

ClaimFlow.title: Claim Organization
ClaimFlow.description: Verify your identity effectively managing this listing.
ClaimFlow.agreeLabel: I agree to the Partner Terms of Service
ClaimFlow.success: Claim request submitted. Check your email.
